description:
* Based on http://anidb.net/cr1288 [Sanrio]`s Mewkledreamy character.
http://anidb.net/ch109233 [Yume] is a cheerful first-year junior high school student who by chance picked up http://anidb.net/ch109236 [Mew], a speaking kitten plush who fell from the sky. By becoming Dream Partners, Mew possesses the power of "Dream Synchro" and is able to enter one`s dream along with Yume. That night, http://anidb.net/ch109248 [the queen] of Miracle Dreamy Kingdom appeared in Yume`s dream, telling her that if she and Mew collect a lot of Dreamy Stones, she can grant her one wish. Since then, Yume starts to collect Dreamy Stones with Mew, while enjoying her school life.
Source: Wikipedia

REGULAR.description:
After falling from the sky, Mew helps Yume to enter her overworked mother’s dream following a stressful day at the office with explosive consequences.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: はじまりのストーリー

REGULAR.description:
Yume learns that she can have one wish granted if she agrees to collect Dreamy Stones at the request of the queen of the Miracle Dream Kingdom.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: A Club Trial with Dream Synchro
ユメシンクロで仮入部

REGULAR.description:
With Mew’s help, Yume tries using a magical power to enter the dream of Sugiyama, a popular older boy at school, but finds herself in the wrong dream.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: 先輩の夢に入っちゃお

REGULAR.description:
When Yume is invited to her classmate Maira’s home after visiting her at a photo shoot, she discovers a stuffed animal who reminds her of Mew.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: もう一人のドリーミーメイト?

REGULAR.description:
When a robot returns her lost bag with Mew still inside, Yume is led to third-year student Kotoko, who is part of the school`s computer club.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

After Kotoko finds a rain-drenched stuffed animal on her roof, Yume and Maira decide to ask her for help with studying for an upcoming exam.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: はじめての中間テスト

REGULAR.description:
Invited by her crush Sugiyama, Yume attends a practice match for the tennis club where her childhood friend Asahi fills in for an injured player.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: フレッ! フレッ! おさななじみ

REGULAR.description:
As Yume and her friends depart for a three-day nature camp, they find themselves playing matchmaker when Yume`s classmate Wakaba develops a crush.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: A Big Fight at School Camp!?

REGULAR.description:
When Yume’s pet dog Kyu seems down during a picnic, she enters his dream to find the cause. But once inside, Kyu looks nothing like what she expected.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: きゅうちゃんのゆううつ

REGULAR.description:
A forlorn Yume misses seeing Sugiyama at practice now that it rains every day, but Kaede knows a love spell that can turn her luck around.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: 雨ふりねぶそくゆめちゃん

REGULAR.description:
Yume’s younger cousin Nana misses her mom too much to enjoy her playdate at Yume’s house, so Yume and her friends must keep a close eye on her.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

Hearing from the queen that Mew has another dream partner, Yume and her friends rush off to find her. Yuni is summoned by the Queen of Nightmares.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: Orecchi ga Saki ni Mitsukeru nyui
オレっちが先に見つけるにゅい

REGULAR.description:
A girl named Tokiwa Anzai transfers to Yume`s school, where she soon finds herself the target of the mischievous Yuni and his dream-invading magic.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

Tokiwa shows off her athletic skills in a school dodgeball contest. But her gift becomes a curse when she attracts more attention than she can handle.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

Yume and her friends meet up to rent dresses for a fireworks festival. When news of the event reaches Yuni, he sees an opportunity to cause mayhem.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

Yume becomes unable to watch Sugiyama play tennis after he quits the club. Realizing how down she feels, her friends endeavor to cheer her up.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: 私はやっぱりチアっちゃお!

REGULAR.description:
Yume has a nightmare about her most hated food: cherry tomatoes. Mew tries helping her learn to like them but the tomato-filled dreams only get worse.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: 恐怖のプチトマトマン

REGULAR.description:
Yume celebrates her birthday while at camp. Although she and her friends can’t enjoy cake or a party, her teachers have a tasty alternative lined up.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: Misaki ni Itte wa Ikenai yo
岬に行ってはいけないよ

REGULAR.description:
The school cheerleading and tennis clubs go on a camp together. Soon after arriving, an old woman warns them to keep away from a certain coastal cape.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: お誕生日ゆめちゃん合宿中

REGULAR.description:
Yume notices that Asahi has been acting strangely since returning from camp. Asahi is taken aback when his newly acquired toy starts talking to him.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: ボンジュール! れいくん

REGULAR.description:
After Tokiwa’s twin brothers Kanta and Kenta arrive home and meet her friends, Tokiwa explains that Kanta hasn`t been his cheerful self lately.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: Kanta to Kenta no Yume Synchro
寛太と健太のユメシンクロ

REGULAR.description:
Mysterious events begin occurring at Yume`s school, from scattered shoes and wet hallways to yokai sightings and a strange voice heard in class.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

Yume goes to buy the new issue of a comic magazine but finds it has sold out. She then sees her classmate and aspiring comic artist Hana with a copy.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

With the school culture festival coming up, Yume’s class decides to prepare a whack-a-mole game. A reluctant Asahi is volunteered to play the mole.
Source: Netflix Japan (translated)

titles.title: パワーアップな文化祭

悪夢のお城だったかも?
